item.title: U.N.-backed panel confirms famine in Gaza. And, DOJ to send Congress some Epstein docs
item.description: A U.N.-backed panel of experts has declared that northern Gaza is suffering from famine. And, the DOJ is expected to release to Congress the first wave of documents related to its Jeffrey Epstein probe.
item.content:encoded:
A U.N.-backed panel of experts has declared that northern Gaza is suffering from famine. And, the DOJ is expected to release to Congress the first wave of documents related to its Jeffrey Epstein probe.

(Image credit: Eyad Baba)

item.title: Famine confirmed in northern Gaza, says U.N.-backed agency
item.description: Famine has been officially declared in northern Gaza, a U.N.-backed group warns — marking the first such confirmation in the Middle East.

item.title: Thai court acquits ex-Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra of royal defamation charge
item.description: Thailand's former Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra was acquitted of a royal defamation charge by a court on Friday, in a case that could have sent him to prison for up to 15 years.
item.content:encoded:
